attributes.title: Scam

attributes.review: App was horrible. I tried to watch LOVE but instead saw a orange racist , ugly, man on my screen. Please don’t download bc you will get your eyes burn. Take CAUTION

I open the app and orange Dangly man is staring at me, he looks depressed and with that face i would be to! My first thought was when did Area 51 let the aliens roam free? I tried to play games but none of them worked. I don’t appreciate that it asked for my phone either that felt redundant.🤬
attributes.title: If I could give zero stars I would

attributes.review:
This app is a secret front for China to steal your information. It should be banned from the US immediately. It look days to download and when it finally did, it asked me horrendously personal questions such as my address and social security. Ever since then I have received weird phone calls and confusing messages to my phone. This app provided me with no information because i’m guessing it is just as uninformed as the president himself. ✨good try donald, but never again 🧚🏻❤️ #donaldtrumpisgross 

Along with deleting this app, don’t forget to vote trump out for clear skin 👁👅👁
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
i started downloading this app 19 years ago, and it just finished downloading😺👍when i installed it my phone froze🧊🥶 and a message displayed that said ‘you”re device has been handed over to the chinese forces”’ and ever since then i have been unable to use my over 🤢and i’ve been forced to feed on the souls of the poor saps who intentionally downloaded this app🤑🤕now my existence has been numbed to a redundant haze, all because i downloaded the app 💕✨✨
would not recommend

attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: I downloaded this app as the patriotic American that I am and chaos broke out. I was HACKED by the CHINESE. Yes those same ones who brought in Ms Rona. Emails were deleted. Private information was used and shared. I might have to move to Europe and start a new life! This is absolutely insane! Who knew that supporting our AMAZING president would wreck my life and force me to leave the country to never again return :(
attributes.title: This app is dangerous
